description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、社会运动家、慈善家及政治迫害受难者。她是刘少奇的第六任妻子。
description.en: Chinese politician, social activist, philanthropist, and victim of political persecution. She was the sixth wife of Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 曾任首任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长、第二任中华人民共和国主席。王光美的丈夫。
description.en: Former Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and the second President of the People's Republic of China. Husband of Wang Guangmei.

description.zh-cn: 王光美的父亲，曾担任中国中央政府经济专门委员。
description.en: Father of Wang Guangmei, served as an economic expert commissioner for the central government of China.

description.zh-cn: 王光美的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Wang Guangmei.

description.zh-cn: 王光美的六哥，创立了中国光大集团，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Sixth older brother of Wang Guangmei, founder of the China Everbright Group, and former Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东夫人，因王光美作为第一夫人出访而感到不满，在文革中主张处死王光美。
description.en: Wife of Mao Zedong, who was dissatisfied with Wang Guangmei's role as First Lady during foreign visits and advocated for her execution during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国共产党中央委员会主席，在文革期间批示对王光美“刀下留人”。
description.en: Then-Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, who intervened during the Cultural Revolution to spare Wang Guangmei's life.

description.zh-cn: 一场由毛泽东发动的政治运动，期间王光美受到严重迫害。
description.en: A political movement initiated by Mao Zedong, during which Wang Guangmei was severely persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 清华大学文革学生领袖，曾被王光美打击，后策划“智擒王光美”事件并组织批斗王光美。
description.en: A student leader at Tsinghua University during the Cultural Revolution, who was initially targeted by Wang Guangmei and later orchestrated the 'deceitful capture of Wang Guangmei' and her public struggle session.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间与江青等人力主处死王光美。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, along with Jiang Qing and others, strongly advocated for the execution of Wang Guangmei.

description.zh-cn: 王光美曾就读并任教的大学。
description.en: The university where Wang Guangmei studied and taught.

description.zh-cn: 王光美于1945年在此毕业，获得物理学学士与硕士学位。
description.en: Wang Guangmei graduated from here in 1945 with bachelor's and master's degrees in physics.

description.zh-cn: 中共辅仁大学工委领导人。
description.en: Leader of the CCP working committee at Fu Jen University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国主席夫人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国主席夫人
en: Spouse of the President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 作为国家主席刘少奇的配偶，王光美承担了第一夫人的角色。
description.en: As the spouse of President Liu Shaoqi, Wang Guangmei assumed the role of the First Lady.

description.zh-cn: 王光美在四清运动中总结出的工作方法，后在文革中成为她受批判的罪状之一。
description.en: A work methodology summarized by Wang Guangmei during the Four Cleanups Movement, which later became one of the charges against her during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 王光美与刘少奇的长女。
description.en: Eldest daughter of Wang Guangmei and Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 由蒯大富策划，以其女刘平平出车祸为由，将王光美骗至医院并扣押的事件。
description.en: An event orchestrated by Kuai Dafu, in which Wang Guangmei was lured to a hospital and detained under the false pretext of her daughter Liu Pingping being in a car accident.

nodes.id: 清华大学批斗王光美大会

zh-cn: 清华大学批斗王光美大会

description.zh-cn: 清华大学召开的30万人大会，会上王光美被红卫兵批斗。
description.en: A rally of 300,000 people held at Tsinghua University where Wang Guangmei was subjected to a struggle session by the Red Guards.

description.zh-cn: 由中国人口福利基金会发起的扶贫计划。
description.en: A poverty alleviation program initiated by the China Population Welfare Foundation.

description.zh-cn: 王光美与刘少奇的儿子，中国人民解放军上将。
description.en: Son of Wang Guangmei and Liu Shaoqi, a General in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 王光美与刘少奇的二女儿，联亚集团董事长兼总裁。
description.en: Second daughter of Wang Guangmei and Liu Shaoqi, Chairman and President of Link-Asia Group.

description.zh-cn: 王光美与刘少奇的小女儿。
description.en: Youngest daughter of Wang Guangmei and Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 王光美的四哥，曾任第四机械工业部副部长、电子工业部总工程师。
description.en: Fourth older brother of Wang Guangmei, former Vice Minister of the Fourth Ministry of Machine Building and Chief Engineer of the Ministry of Electronics Industry.

description.zh-cn: 王光美的五哥，抗日时期中华民国空军王牌飞行员。
description.en: Fifth older brother of Wang Guangmei, an ace pilot of the Republic of China Air Force during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 1948年8月21日，王光美与刘少奇于西柏坡结婚。
description.en: On August 21, 1948, Wang Guangmei married Liu Shaoqi in Xibaipo.

description.zh-cn: 王治昌是王光美的父亲。
description.en: Wang Zhichang is the father of Wang Guangmei.

description.zh-cn: 董洁如是王光美的母亲。
description.en: Dong Jieru is the mother of Wang Guangmei.

degree.zh-cn: 物理学学士、物理学硕士
degree.en: Bachelor of Physics, Master of Physics

description.zh-cn: 1945年毕业于辅仁大学，获物理学学士与硕士学位。
description.en: Graduated from Fu Jen University in 1945 with bachelor's and master's degrees in physics.

position.en: Teaching Assistant in the Physics Department

description.zh-cn: 1948年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in 1948.

position.en: English Translator for the CCP Delegation

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争胜利前夕结识了中共辅仁大学工委领导人崔月犁。
description.en: Before the victory of the Anti-Japanese War, she got to know Cui Yueli, the leader of the CCP working committee at Fu Jen University.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国主席夫人

description.zh-cn: 外国媒体多以“第一夫人”称呼王光美，引起毛泽东夫人江青不满。
description.en: Foreign media often referred to Wang Guangmei as the 'First Lady', which caused dissatisfaction for Mao Zedong's wife, Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中，王光美遭到批斗并被投入秦城监狱，直至1978年12月恢复人身自由。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wang Guangmei was subjected to struggle sessions and imprisoned in Qincheng Prison until her personal freedom was restored in December 1978.

description.zh-cn: 1966年6月，出任清华大学工作组顾问的王光美严厉打击蒯大富，在清华掀起“反蒯运动”。
description.en: In June 1966, as an advisor to the work group at Tsinghua University, Wang Guangmei severely cracked down on Kuai Dafu, launching the 'Anti-Kuai Movement' at Tsinghua.

description.zh-cn: 策划“智擒王光美”事件，将王光美扣押，并于同年4月10日组织了对她的批斗大会。
description.en: Orchestrated the 'deceitful capture of Wang Guangmei' event, detaining her, and organized a struggle session against her on April 10 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中与江青等人力主处死王光美。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, along with Jiang Qing and others, strongly advocated for the execution of Wang Guangmei.

description.zh-cn: 在林彪、江青等人力主处死王光美时，批示“刀下留人”，使其幸免于死。
description.en: When Lin Biao, Jiang Qing, and others strongly advocated for Wang Guangmei's execution, Mao Zedong intervened with the instruction 'spare her from the blade', saving her life.

description.zh-cn: 王光美在四清运动前期，带工作队到河北桃园大队搞试点，总结出“桃园经验”。
description.en: In the early stage of the Four Cleanups Movement, Wang Guangmei led a work team to Taoyuan Brigade in Hebei to conduct a pilot project, from which she summarized the 'Taoyuan Experience'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中，王光美因其的“桃园经验”而遭到造反派批斗。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wang Guangmei was targeted and subjected to struggle sessions by rebels because of her 'Taoyuan Experience'.

position.en: Director of the Foreign Affairs Bureau

description.zh-cn: 拍卖母亲留下的古董，所得56.6万元人民币全部捐献给“幸福工程”。
description.en: She auctioned off antiques left by her mother and donated the entire proceeds of 566,000 RMB to 'Project Happiness'.

description.zh-cn: 获颁柬埔寨王家大十字勋章。
description.en: Was awarded the Grand Cross of the Royal Order of Cambodia.
